name: smartedify-tooling
description: Tooling y automatizaciones para contratos OpenAPI y utilidades transversales.

scripts.test:auth:nix: cd apps/services/auth-service && SKIP_DB_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test AUTH_ADMIN_API_KEY=test-admin-key npm run test:proj:unit --silent && SKIP_DB_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test AUTH_ADMIN_API_KEY=test-admin-key npm run test:proj:contract --silent
scripts.test:auth:win: cd apps\services\auth-service && set SKIP_DB_TESTS=1&& set NODE_ENV=test&& set AUTH_ADMIN_API_KEY=test-admin-key&& npm run test:proj:unit --silent&& npm run test:proj:contract --silent
scripts.test:all:nix: npm run test:auth:nix && npm run test:tenant
scripts.test:all:win: npm run test:auth:win && npm run test:tenant
scripts.test:contract:nix: cd apps/services/auth-service && SKIP_DB_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test AUTH_ADMIN_API_KEY=test-admin-key npm run test:proj:contract --silent
scripts.test:contract:win: cd apps\services\auth-service && set SKIP_DB_TESTS=1&& set NODE_ENV=test&& set AUTH_ADMIN_API_KEY=test-admin-key&& npm run test:proj:contract --silent
